front.title: Privacy-Enhanced Tokens for Authorization in ACE

abstract.t: This specification defines PAT, "Privacy-Enhanced-Authorization- Tokens" or "Pseudonym-based Authorization Tokens", a protocol and a token construction procedure for client authorization in a constrained environment, similar to DCAF [I-D.gerdes-ace-dcaf- authorize]. The tokens can be also used to establish a Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) channel between resource-constrained nodes.
